description: This file defines an Angular service called EventBusService that implements a publish/subscribe event pattern. It allows components to listen for specific events and be notified when those events are emitted, facilitating decoupled communication within an Angular application.

classes.name: EventBusService
classes.description: An Angular service that manages event subscriptions and emissions, enabling components to communicate via an event bus pattern.

methods.name: on
methods.description: Subscribes a handler function to a specific event. Returns an unsubscribe function to remove the listener.

methods.name: emit
methods.description: Emits an event with an optional detail object to all registered listeners for that event.

ctags.name: listeners
ctags.pattern: /^  private listeners = new Map<string, Set<(detail: any) => void>>();$/

fields.name: private listeners = new Map<string, Set<(detail: any) => void>>();
